articles.title: Amy Schumer Announces Divorce From Husband Chris Fischer - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actress shared the news on Instagram, where she wrote, "We love each other very much and will continue to focus on raising our son."

articles.title: LaKeith Stanfield to Star in Dennis Rodman ’48 Hours in Vegas’ Movie - Variety
articles.description: LaKeith Stanfield is taking over the role after Jonathan Majors was dropped from the film following his assault conviction.

articles.title: Google Removes AI Videos of Disney Characters After Cease and Desist Letter - Variety
articles.description: Google has taken down dozens of AI-generated videos of Disney-owned characters after the studio sent a cease and desist letter on Wednesday.

articles.title: 'I Love LA' Star Jordan Firstman Rips 'Heated Rivalry' Over Gay Sex Scenes - TMZ
articles.description: Jordan Firstman is ripping the HBO Max hit "Heated Rivalry" ... he says the show has a bunch of unrealistic gay sex scenes.

articles.title: A man ate at the same Florida restaurant every day for a decade. When he stopped showing up, the chef went looking for him. - CBS News
articles.description: Charlie Hicks ate his lunch and dinner at the Shrimp Basket in Pensacola, Florida, every day for 10 years. When he suddenly stopped showing up, the chef went looking for him, and ultimately saved his life.

articles.title: John Cena last match: How he reached the top of WWE - BBC
articles.description: The man behind the "You Can't See Me" catchphrase is fighting one last time on Saturday night. But who is he, really?

articles.title: ‘Holes’: Gender-Swapped Reboot Pilot Not Going Forward At Disney+ - Deadline
articles.description: Disney+ is not proceeding with its pilot Holes, a reimagining of Louis Sachar’s 1998 novel and the 2003 Disney movie adaptation with a female lead.

articles.title: Hailee Steinfeld Is Pregnant, Expecting First Child With Husband Josh Allen - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The 'Sinners' actress and NFL player announced they are expecting their first child on Friday with a sweet Instagram post.

articles.title: ‘Zootopia 2’ Still Making Noise In Third Weekend With $25M No. 1 Haul – Box Office Update - Deadline
articles.description: Zootopia 2 after making a $1 billion at the global box office, is no. 1 in its third weekend at the U.S. box office with $25M.

articles.title: So That’s What Stellan Skarsgård Is Like As a Father - Vulture
articles.description: Father-and-son duo Stellan and Alexander Skarsgård are giving us a peek behind the curtain at their intra-family dynamics while promoting ‘Sentimental Value’ and ‘Pillion.’

articles.title: How Bi Gan pulled off the most technically impressive movie scene of the year - The Verge
articles.description: One of the year’s most visually striking films, Resurrection, features a stunning 30-minute unbroken tracking shot. Director Bi Gan tells us how he pulled it off.

articles.title: Popular influencer dies after falling from 9th floor of high-rise apartment - MLive.com
articles.description: She was known for tattoos and extensive cosmetic procedures.

articles.title: Taylor Swift Changed Some ‘Reputation’ Lyrics. What Could It Mean? - Rolling Stone
King Charles III says he'll scale back cancer treatment thanks to early diagnosis - CBS News
articles.description: King Charles III says that his cancer treatment will be reduced in the new year because of early diagnosis, effective intervention and adherence to doctor's orders.

articles.title: Taylor Swift gave her Eras Tour crew bonuses in amounts that literally made their jaws drop - Business Insider
articles.description: In the new Eras Tour docuseries, Taylor Swift distributes bonuses and handwritten letters to her dancers, musicians, and crew members.

articles.title: David Zaslav Could Become a Billionaire if Warner Bros. Sells to Either Netflix or Paramount - Variety
articles.description: Warner Bros. Discovery CEO David Zaslav stands to become a billionaire if WBD completes a sale to either Netflix or Paramount SKydance.

articles.title: Screen Talk’s Top 10 Films of 2025 - IndieWire
articles.description: From 'Misericordia' to 'Sinners,' Screen Talk's best movies of 2025.

articles.title: A study in contrasts: The cinematography of Wake Up Dead Man - Ars Technica
articles.description: Ars chats with cinematographer Steve Yedlin about bringing Rian Johnson’s Gothic vision to life.

articles.title: Wait, Who’s Starring in Street Fighter? - Vulture
articles.description: The upcoming ‘Street Fighter’ movie features a cast of thousands, with Jason Momoa, Noah Centineo, Orville Peck, and more all going at each other’s throats. Choose your fighter.

articles.title: Sarah Sherman on Comedy Special, Nude Prosthetics and Adam Sandler - Variety
articles.description: Sarah Sherman unpacks her debut stand-up special 'Sarah Squirm: Live + in the Flesh' and those nude prosthetics.
